# Blaze of Light (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Light Spells|light]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[1st Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 60 ft.

**Area:** Cone

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Heroes of Battle (WotC), pg. 125

A cone of bright light shines forth from just above the casterâ€™s head. All creatures within the cone that fail a Fortitude saving throw are [[Dazzled|dazzled]] for 1 minute. Sightless creatures are not affected by *blaze of light*.

A light spell (one with the light descriptor) counters and dispels a darkness spell (one with the darkness descriptor) of an equal or lower level.
